root_causes.detail: apps.humanatlas.io/api/v1/technology-names returns 0 Unknown Error (CORS or endpoint down)
root_causes.fix: Check CORS headers on the API. The endpoint may be missing or misconfigured for cross-origin requests.

root_causes.detail: SVG icons for organs and products returning 0 Unknown Error from CDN
root_causes.fix: Verify CDN paths for kg-explorer icon assets. All-organs.svg, 3d-organ.svg, and others are not resolving.

root_causes.detail: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading '0') in eR.unproject / getLastPickedObject
root_causes.fix: Add null check before accessing index [0] in the picking pipeline. Occurs when users click empty space before model fully loads.
Audit ccf-organ-info asset paths. The component is embedded in multiple tools and failing on every load.
